hero.title: Energy beyond Earth
hero.subtitle: NeoWatt is engineering resilient, high-efficiency orbital power systems that expand mission range, reliability, and operational endurance.

vision.title: Build the power backbone of the space economy
vision.body: Our vision is a modular energy platform that scales from single spacecraft missions to persistent multi-node orbital infrastructure. We are focused on precision power delivery, robust thermal and RF performance, and production-ready architecture.

problem.title: Space missions are constrained by fragile power assumptions
problem.body: Existing systems often trade reliability, transmission efficiency, or integration speed. As orbital operations become continuous and distributed, power has to move from a subsystem to a strategic capability with higher endurance, tighter control loops, and mission-adaptive redundancy.

technology.title: Transmission-led architecture with system-level control
technology.body: NeoWatt combines high-integrity power electronics, transmission-aware design, and software-assisted operational control. The result is a platform engineered for predictable performance in dynamic orbital conditions.

features.title: Adaptive RF Pathing
features.description: Transmission chain tuning to maintain efficient delivery through changing orbital geometry and thermal conditions.

features.title: Fault-Tolerant Energy Core
features.description: Redundant topology for graceful degradation and continuity under component-level disruptions.

features.title: Mission-Aware Controls
features.description: Real-time diagnostics and control strategies aligned to mission phase and load profile.

roadmap.title: Milestones from validation to deployment
roadmap.body: A staged roadmap focused on de-risking transmission performance, hardening system architecture, and accelerating route-to-orbit execution.

supporters.title: Backed by high-trust partners
supporters.body: NeoWatt is supported by organisations helping translate deep engineering into deployable capability.

team.title: Cross-disciplinary team for mission-critical systems
team.body: Our team spans power systems, RF engineering, software, and space mission operations to deliver an integrated product.

contact.title: Work with us
contact.body: Join our update list for technical milestones, programme progress, and collaboration announcements.
